question: For the past few months I have been getting my haydh regularly but after a few days I am bleeding again. Is this part of haydh?
answer:
QUESTION
If this is not part of Ghayd. Could u explain what to do when u want to salaah and batcha the Quran. Could u also explain what to do when u need to fill the necessary things when one is married.
